entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
